content.calc: Execute the tally of the poll. Just paste below all your fellows text answers.
content.generator: Create your EmojiPoll text and say goodbye to traditional link polls! Just enter the possible options and share the text on your favorite messaging app. Once they have answered you (with emoji), you can calculate the outcome of the survey with the link above!

card.content: You can now copy it and/or share it with anyone. Then, you can parse the answers pasting them in the specific page.
